mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board2(title, content, writer) values(#{title},#{content},#{writer})
mapper.select: select *from tbl_board2 where bno > 0 order by bno desc limit #{skip} , #{amount}
mapper.update: update tbl_board2 set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(bno) from tbl_board2 where bno > 0

select * from tbl_board2
title like concat('%',#{val},'%')
content like concat('%',#{val},'%')
writer like concat('%',#{val},'%')
order by bno desc limit 0,20
